title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Cybersecurity Leadership Training for Practical Healthcare Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners explain organizational personal information breach response procedures with over 90% accuracy.
Learners establish basic security vulnerability diagnosis and initial response strategies with over 85% success rate in simulated hacking scenarios.
Learners participate in gamification platform discussion boards at least three times weekly, proposing security policy improvements based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
